trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os alinhamentos possíveis com a qual os itens de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> podem ser apresentados.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of ToolStripLayoutStyle with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode controlar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>esquema por escolher um dos membros ToolStripLayoutStyle com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Pilha esquemas empilhamento é arranging de itens ao lado entre si em ambas as extremidades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: A lista seguinte descreve as esquemas de pilha.

trans-unit.source: - StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: -StackWithOverflow é a predefinição.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Esta definição faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para alterar o respetiva esquema automaticamente em conformidade com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>propriedade para processar arrastar e cenários de ancoragem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: -VerticalStackWithOverflow compõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>itens junto a si verticalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: -HorizontalStackWithOverflow compõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>itens junto a si horizontalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: Outras funcionalidades de pilha esquemas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>determina o fim do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para que o item está alinhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens se ajustar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, aparece automaticamente um botão de sobrecarga.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>definição de propriedade determina se um item é apresentado na área de capacidade excedida sempre, conforme necessário ou nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, pode inspecionar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, a capacidade excedida <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se está não atualmente visível em todos os.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Os motivos pelos quais típicos por que razão não for apresentado um item estão de que o item não se ajustará o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Efetuar uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>movable colocando-numa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>e definir o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: Outras opções de esquema as outras opções de esquema são fluxo e de tabela.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de fluxo de esquema de fluxo é a predefinição para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: É semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: As funcionalidades do esquema de fluxo são os seguintes:-todas as funcionalidades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Tem de converter a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: -Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>Propriedades no código para alinhar com os itens na linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -Na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, pode inspecionar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou não foi possível ajustar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -Não é composto controlo e, por conseguinte, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no estilo do esquema de fluxo num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>não pode ser movida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>botão sobrecarga não é composto, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Table Layout Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de tabela de esquema de tabela é a predefinição para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: É semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows: - All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: As funcionalidades do esquema de tabela são os seguintes:-todas as funcionalidades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Tem de converter a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>classe para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings>

trans-unit.source: - You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: -Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>Propriedades no código para alinhar com os itens na célula de tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: - In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: -Na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>eventos, pode inspecionar as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou não foi possível ajustar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: -Não é composto controlo e, por conseguinte, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no estilo do esquema de tabela num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>não é possível mover.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>botão sobrecarga não é composto, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens circular horizontal ou verticalmente, conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos horizontalmente e overflow conforme necessários.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são apresentados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são apresentados esvaziamento à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que itens são dispostos verticalmente, centra-se do controlo e overflow conforme necessários.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
